summary: Client requested Sarah start a version meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide comments.

actions.task: Propose a name for the project

backlog_deltas.title: Create meeting agenda for version meeting

risks.risk: Key roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not respond during meeting start.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with each stakeholder to obtain input, assign explicit owners for outstanding items, and set deadlines; escalate if no response.
